headline: Citi, Coinbase ink stablecoin partnership
summary: The bank’s head of payments and services called the collaboration “a natural extension of [Citi’s] ‘network of networks’ approach.”

raw.headline: Citi, Coinbase ink stablecoin partnership
raw.summary: The bank’s head of payments and services called the collaboration “a natural extension of [Citi’s] ‘network of networks’ approach.”

headline: Citi’s Ryan: Employee buy-in on AI will yield ‘innovation dividend’
summary: “There's no way we can sit in New York and come up with the strategy for a global company and implement it if we're not bringing our people on the strategy,” Tim Ryan said at Money20/20.

raw.headline: Citi’s Ryan: Employee buy-in on AI will yield ‘innovation dividend’
raw.summary: “There's no way we can sit in New York and come up with the strategy for a global company and implement it if we're not bringing our people on the strategy,” Tim Ryan said at Money20/20.

headline: Is Citigroup’s 61.5% Stock Surge in 2025 Justified by Recent Restructuring?
summary: If you are weighing what to do with Citigroup stock right now, you are far from alone. After all, the past several months have been anything but dull for one of Wall Street’s most storied names. Whether you are hoping to ride the next big wave or considering if now is the time to take some chips off the table, Citigroup’s recent journey gives you plenty to think about. Just look at the run so far this year. Citigroup’s stock is up 45.0% since January and has soared an incredible 61.5% over...
